Here are some potential recommendations based on the given list:

  * The Secret of My Success (1982) - This movie stars Bill Fagerbakke as a successful businessman who becomes obsessed with replicating his success in others' lives. |
  * Batman Returns (1992) - This classic superhero film starring Michael Keaton as Batman, Jack Nicholson as the Joker, and Uma Thurman as Selina Kyle, is based on the DC Comics character of the same name. The film tells the story of Bruce Wayne (played by Michael Keaton), who has become known as Batman, due to his habit of wearing a dark suit with high-tech gadgets that include bat detectors, night vision scopes, and even remote controlled robots that can be used for various purposes, such as catching criminals or delivering packages. |
  * True Blood (2004-2018) - This popular American supernatural drama television series based on the comic book series of the same name by Bryan Hill, is set in the fictional town of Bon Temps, Louisiana, USA, and follows the lives of various characters in this town, including the main character, Sookie Stackhouse (played by Anna Kendrick), who has become known as "甜心小妇人" or "Sassy Chick" due to her habit of wearing short skirts that show off her nice legs, and also due to her habit of speaking out her opinions in a way that is not afraid to be controversial or even offensive, such as when she was asked if she wanted to have sex with her brother, Sookie Stackhouse (played by Anna Kendrick) - "Yes!"

After watching a film that encourages his superhero dreams, Ryan decides that he too has what it takes to save the world, and decides to test his powers by  "flying" off long balcony of apartment. However, Ryan' spirit will not be crushed, and his adventure will continue on.
3. The movie explores themes such as horror, suspense, mystery, terror, fear, bravery, courage, and survival.
4. "The Dark Knight" - A superhero movie that follows the story of Batman (Christian Bale), a detective with extraordinary skills who lives in Gotham City. As Batman investigates the mysterious death of Gotham's mayor, he discovers that it is not just one criminal who is behind the mayor's murder, but rather a group of highly organized and skilled criminals who have been operating in Gotham City for years and are responsible for the majority of the violent crimes and other crimes that occur in Gotham City.
As Batman continues to investigate the group of highly organized and skilled criminals who are behind the mayor's murder, he discovers that the group is led by the notorious criminal mastermind known as The Joker (Heath Ledger)).
